message.body: Are you serious about getting a laser cnc?
Yeah but it's a big to do. I need like 60 grand
Well, heads up, if you wanted to keep it in the shop space you'd have to find one that is single phase.
Ideally in 2 years I will move into a real warehouse space with 3 phase though so maybe by the time you actually get one it won't matter.
It's not happening anytime soon. So that's a problem for a later date. What is your service there
